Easy to set up and quick to launch. In a short time, I managed to have project and sales information available to the entire team, wherever the team was located.
The best no coding platform I have used so far I love the experience and everything most especially after testing so many platforms alike I have realized none of them met my taste like glide.

I love Glide. Your team has made it simple to create apps. My Glide app is a bookkeeping app. It is a monthly subscription-based app. Therefore, I have users/subscribers for my app. Those subscribers use "Rows/Data" within Glide. I'm currently on the Pro Plan. Eventually, I (my users) will hit a cap on row usage. So, my only ask would be: For Glide to have a plan I could purchase that will allow unlimited row data usage (without hitting some sort of cap). This would allow me to grow my app and possibly hold an unlimited amount of users. Other than this I love Glide. Your team has brought my idea to life. Shoutout to your Glide Expert Robert Petitto. He has helped a TON and is so skilled! He's a Doogie Howser.

Review.Titre: Incredibly Powerful Tool for managing databases
Review.Contenu: Honestly, I can't believe Glide is free. It's true that the free accounts are limited, but for making hobby apps and learning how to use the software, it was very practical and was not limiting at all. I made several apps that were personally useful to me. And it's not until I was confident enough to start making apps for work (I work in education) and play (I volunteer for a non-profit tennis league) that I hit the limitations of the free account because of the number of users and edits using the app every month. I have a rudimentary knowledge of programming and am proficient at spreadsheets, but glide allows me to do things that I would never be able to program on my own and it is very intuitive. Coded spreadsheets that were cumbersome to use and had low capabilities due to my limited programming knowledge, are now apps that are streamlined, used from my phone, and blow people's minds. It's like what Dreamweaver was for websites, but better. I only wish the apps would work offline... and that toggle switches/boolean column edits wouldn't count toward the monthly edit count. The customer service is excellent with very short response times and I find the basic plan is good value, but the next higher plan is a big jump, especially if you are doing non-profit work. As a Canadian, I also wish the invoice would state that the price paid is in American currency. It would make my life much easier if they would put USD $25 instead of just $25.

Review.Titre: This company is really helping people
Review.Contenu: This company is really helping people with app ideas but no experience of coding, like myself, to create useful digital interfaces to any spreadsheet. Surprisingly easy to learn even beyond the basics.

Review.Titre: It is very easy to create apps
Review.Contenu: It is very easy to create apps. And the design of the interfaces is very flexible and you get awesome results.
Very good experience. Glide app help a lot my business.

Review.Titre: Easy to use. Creates beautiful pages
Review.Contenu: Easy to use, thanks to intuitive design interface where interaction can be as simple as just drag & drop of predefined objects on a graphical representation of the app your are creating. The objects look & feel help create pages views that are refined and beautiful

Review.Titre: Glide Apps is the most amazing no-code app building platform i've ever used!
Review.Contenu: Glide Apps is the most amazing no-code app building platform i've ever used. Everything is clean and easy to navigate and the tutorial videos, documentation, case studies, templates and active community of industry experts make it an easy learning experience, i'm one click away from help, 24/7.I can link my mobile apps and web apps to my google sheets or excel but lately i've found their data editor so easy to use, i try build everything directly off there.When i first started using Glide almost 3 years ago the most important thing was the look and feel of the apps, that's what sold me on Glide Apps, but they have grown massively in three years and the user interface designs, components, functionality, help tools etc just keep getting better and it's been an exciting journey ever since. I love the fact that the apps don't need to be downloaded and it's 2 clicks for my users to install the app on their home screen.I can build small, medium or even enterprise apps with massive capacity as my projects grow.I started building Glide Apps at the start of covid lockdown in 2020 (coming from the construction industry) and i turned this into my new career path within 2 days, zero cash down and no prior experience.I'm loving the laptop lifestyle that Glide offers me and i'd recommend Glide to anyone.
the community is active and helps a lot, contact with the company is quick and agile, they try to help however they can!

Review.Titre: Things are easy enough for someone just…
Review.Contenu: Things are easy enough for someone just getting started and robust enough as the learning goes on.

Review.Titre: It's the best no code tool out there.
Review.Contenu: GlideApps allows you to build complex apps and portals with extreme functionality. I've used it to build a mimic of the SAP ERPs
